m_displayName: _NOT USED - MONSTRE FLAQUEUX - BOSS - Flyrilos le Sage

description.fr:
<rem>{range}</rem>
\---
{%Attack} Soigne les alliés de son {%at}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} par {FloorMechanism:431} pour le tour sur le terrain.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Invoque {value:v} {FloorMechanism:431, value:v}.
description.en:
{range}
\---
{%Attack} Heals allies an amount equal to his {%at}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {power:pow,percent,+} per {FloorMechanism:431} on the field for the turn.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Summons {value:v}\_{FloorMechanism:431, value:v} on the field.
description.es:
{range}
\---
{%Attack} Cura a sus aliados un valor igual a su {%at}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {power:pow,percent,+} por {FloorMechanism:431} en el terreno durante el turno.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Invoca {value:v} {FloorMechanism:431} en el terreno.
description.de:
{range}
\---
{%Attack} Heilt seine Verbündeten um seinen {%at}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {power:pow,percent,+} pro {FloorMechanism:431} auf dem Spielfeld für die Runde.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Verursacht {value:v} {FloorMechanism:431} auf dem Spielfeld.
description.pt:
{range}
\---
{%Attack} Cura seus aliados de um valor igual a seu {%at}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {power:pow,percent,+} por {FloorMechanism:431} no campo de batalha durante o turno.
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} INVOCA {value:v} {FloorMechanism:431} no campo de batalha.
